column5: Anybody know where to get good service for reel repairs around Ottawa area?? Reel to reel is up for sale and are no longer accepting new reels/rods...  Thanks
hope you find one  there are a few down this way you could mail them out but I am sure you want one close to home
Depending on the reel the factory service is usually best for me..Ship it out and have it refurbished..Had my Stradic done a couple years back by Shimano. did an awesome job too, just like new!
Sorry for the hijack but what did they charge you to refurbish?
